706162f-a.text:
[On back of photo:]

P.L. Sperr, photographer   6-16-1942
Neg. A-620

[On front of card upon which photo is mounted (NYPL link):]

Brooklyn    PACIFIC ST. E. across BOERUM PL.    [and, handwritten in upper R corner:]  249 / B3
706162f-a.folder: Pacific Street & Boerum Place, Brooklyn, NY
